Player History
Drafted in 35th round, 545th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 3/2/2016 (Going to CIN: SS Terry Corcoran. Going to HOU: 1B Robert Weitzman, RF Andres Caban)...
Traded from Houston to Brooklyn on 5/1/2018 (Going to HOU: P Alex Gutierrez. Going to BRO: 1B Robert Weitzman, P Richard Thomas)...
Had first career hit on 5/27/2018, off Nickolas Orduna (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/2018, off Dave Gurrola (NY)...
Injured on 8/11/2021 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Brooklyn on 4/1/2023...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2025 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/31/2025 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
